title: Don't blame the Jungler.
body: Suggest ways they could better themselves. {{sticker:slayer-jinx-catface}}

replies.body:
No-one blames the jungler, they merely say something like "can I get a gank", when their lane is pushed or they are 0-3. The jungler shouldn't gank them, but they also shouldn't get pissed like a majority do and take "can I get a gank" as blaming them that their lane is fed.

And if people still blame the jungler that they don't win their lane, sometimes it actually is the junglers fault. Obviously not in bronze-gold ELO, but if a mid laner is in a really important lane matchup that decides the game, or at least teamfights, the jungler's priority should be that. However, if the jungler doesn't gank and mid feeds the lane, it is not the jungler's fault. It is mids. I guess what I am trying to say is that even if they should've ganked and it is their fault for that, the mid could've not fed in the exact same manner.

Unless we are talking about Viktor or Le'Blanc. If they get first blood I don't think you can blame anyone.

Viktor i can understand as you can't really blame anyone, but Le'Blanc? really?

It's not all that hard to play around a Le'Blanc.

Every time I talk about a champion like that everyone thinks I am saying they are OP these days. Sigh. If you had read, (and a simple statistic search), if neither jungler ganks, Le'Blanc most often gets first blood. That is what she is built for. 

If she gets first blood, you can't blame the jungler for not ganking or mid for dying, because Le'Blanc thrives at getting early kills against other weaker mid laners. Of course it is easy to beat her, she has a 47% win rate.

> [{quoted}](name=Rengorax,realm=OCE,application-id=Ntey9fRZ,discussion-id=EEQWbsAK,comment-id=000300000000,timestamp=2016-07-11T07:04:17.359+0000)
>
> Every time I talk about a champion like that everyone thinks I am saying they are OP these days. Sigh. If you had read, (and a simple statistic search), if neither jungler ganks, Le'Blanc most often gets first blood. That is what she is built for. 
> 
> If she gets first blood, you can't blame the jungler for not ganking or mid for dying, because Le'Blanc thrives at getting early kills against other weaker mid laners. Of course it is easy to beat her, she has a 47% win rate.

anivia has damage just as bad as a leblanc or viktor too. Can't dodge a targeted e that does massive damage because she presses r on you just as it hits
It is better now at least that her ult is mini at the start and costs heaps of mana for it to stay up. Le'Blanc's damage is pretty point and click.

Oh god thats funny.

Even more so coming from you.
But its always the Junglers and Supports fault ;^)
You could say that about any role but it'll take a genius to better themselves to your liking over the course of a single game
